title: DId you guys even test Graves?
body: He's ridiculously broken. He's now a top laner, ggez.

replies.body:
Braum makes him useless. Block Q+R, have your midlaner destroy him.

That being said he is broken as f, and his Q damage will most likely be cut in HALF before next season starts
you only get hit by that if you stuffed up.
Not really. if it hits a wall, it will immediately jump back, giving no time to react.
exactly, being against the wall IS A STUFF UP
but some people may not know that yet, so you can't say they stuffed up just because they were against a wall. New graves has only been out for like 3 days.
I'm thinking Braum and Taric are going to be great supports this meta :)
Seeing as Taric is my go-to tank support, I approve of this.
Hell yeah man, He is amazing, Pity people don't understand him so they think he is shitty.
I like his point and click stun most.

Dude, did you see that mad flash E? Those mechanics. 

Although i did get a Tristana a Penta by doing that ;)
He's more of a jungler now.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=00yW4fuw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-12T11:07:37.868+0000)
>
> He's more of a jungler now.

mid lane agasint melees GG wp

Tried him. It was a massacre. I barely even had to try. With my Soraka at my beck and call I was an invulnerable monster who only ever died when he decided to go out 1 vs 5 for the shits and the giggles.
lol he was more broken when he was first released. That shit was insane.

> [{quoted}](name=Serfige,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=00yW4fuw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T10:57:34.639+0000)
>
> lol he was more broken when he was first released. That shit was insane.

I hate a LB jump on me as Graves, one first auto on her chunked her for 60% of her HP, second shot killed her before she could even go back to her distortion, lmfao.
When he was released on PBE he got MR per level, think about that for a second.
